1.caption_en: A group of protesters hold a large banner reading "THERE IS NO PLANET B" during a climate demonstration.

3.caption_en:
A group of protesters march down a street holding a large banner that reads "THERE IS NO PLANET B" to demand climate action. The banner spans the image and is held by multiple people whose hands are visible along the top edge.
